video.name: Garlic Pasta with Cajun Cauliflower | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Garlic Pasta with Roasted Cajun Cauliflower. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/06/vegan-garlic-pasta-roasted-cajun-cauliflower.html

Cauliflower tossed in homemade Cajun spice blend and baked, then served over easy creamy Garlic Sauce Penne Pasta. Vegan Recipe. Can be Nut-free gluten-free. Make your own Cajun blend to adjust heat. Everyone Approved and Superhit Weeknight Dinner. Add mushrooms or other veggies for variation. See post link above. 

Recipes like these in my BOOK, Shipping Worldwide now!!: http://www.veganricha.com/vrekaz 

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1
#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

recipeIngredient: 1  small head of cauliflower cut into florets (3 heaping cups)
2 tsp paprika ((I use 1 tsp sweet mild paprika and 1 tsp smoked hot paprika))
1/2 tsp red pepper flakes or use more smoked paprika
1/2 tsp salt ( 1/4 to 1/2 tsp to preference)
2 cups unsweetened non dairy milk such as almond milk or soymilk or use cashew milk for creamier
1 tbsp flour (or use rice flour to make gluten-free)
1/4 tsp or more dried thyme (,+ generous dashes of other herbs such as basil, sage, oregano)
chopped basil or parsley for garnish
black pepper or cayenne and lemon juice for garnish

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Add the Cauliflower florets to a large bowl. Drizzle oil and mix using a spatula or rub it in using hands.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Add the Cauliflower florets to a large bowl. Drizzle oil and mix using a spatula or rub it in using hands.

itemListElement.text: In a small bowl, mix the ingredients under cajun spice blend. Add a bit more paprika if using mild. Sprinkle all over the cauliflower florets and toss to coat. (use 1.5 tbsp or more of premade cajun blend).
itemListElement.name: In a small bowl, mix the ingredients under cajun spice blend. Add a bit more paprika if using mild. Sprinkle all over the cauliflower florets and toss to coat. (use 1.5 tbsp or more of premade cajun blend).

itemListElement.text: Make the pasta according to instructions on the package, drain and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Make the pasta according to instructions on the package, drain and set aside.

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium low heat. Add minced garlic and cook for 3 to 4 minutes, or until golden, stirring occasionally.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium low heat. Add minced garlic and cook for 3 to 4 minutes, or until golden, stirring occasionally.

itemListElement.text: Meanwhile blend the rest of the ingredients (except garnish) until smooth. Add to the pan. Increase heat to medium.
itemListElement.name: Meanwhile blend the rest of the ingredients (except garnish) until smooth. Add to the pan. Increase heat to medium.

itemListElement.text: Bring the sauce to a boil stirring occasionally. Taste and adjust salt and flavor carefully. Simmer for another 2 minutes. You can add in some cajun blend to the sauce as well for additional flavor. Fold in the pasta. Take off heat, cover and let sit for 2 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Bring the sauce to a boil stirring occasionally. Taste and adjust salt and flavor carefully. Simmer for another 2 minutes. You can add in some cajun blend to the sauce as well for additional flavor. Fold in the pasta. Take off heat, cover and let sit for 2 minutes.

itemListElement.text: To serve, add warm baked Cajun Cauliflower on top. Garnish with chopped parsley or basil, some cayenne/pepper and lemon juice.
itemListElement.name: To serve, add warm baked Cajun Cauliflower on top. Garnish with chopped parsley or basil, some cayenne/pepper and lemon juice.
